page.title: 02Landscape of Gamston
page.content: The{A52}is a major trunk route joining{Derby}and{Grantham,}via {Nottingham.}It is a dual carriageway road which carries a lot of heavy traffic, both private and commercial vehicles. The busiest times of the day see a heavy traffic flow of around 850 vehicles an hour. The{mineral railway}passes over it near to Radcliffe-on-Trent. From the road we were able to see all the area in our block. Fields of{grazing land}and{cereal {crops}can be seen on either side of the road. About four miles out of Nottingham there is a petrol filling station with a new Happy Eater restaurent adjoining it. Here travellers can have a meal before continuing their journey. Next to it are two houses and{Holme Pierrepont {Primary School.
